title: 新手开服出错，求解
author: o00nmq
txt_content:
服务端是本论坛里顶置的1.7.2官方服务端，未加载任何mod或插件或地图，开服后，用1.7.2客户端连接，一直卡在登入中界面，服务端日记如下（IP打码~）：
14:55:12 [严重] java.io.IOException: Bad packet id 20


14:55:12 [严重]         at net.minecraft.server.Packet.a(Packet.java:73)


14:55:12 [严重]         at net.minecraft.server.NetworkManager.g(NetworkManager.java:149)


14:55:12 [严重]         at net.minecraft.server.NetworkManager.c(NetworkManager.java:259)


14:55:12 [严重]         at net.minecraft.server.NetworkReaderThread.run(SourceFile:84)


14:55:12 [信息] /223.73.36.**:9283 lost connection

replies.author: dycfish
replies.txt_content: 你既然没装MOD么 那就是属于纯净的，因该去下个核心文件运行下！

replies.author: wangjiejun2012
replies.txt_content: 求助，我不知道该怎么弄服务器
